content: In conclusion, a Deed of Novation is an important legal document that can be used in a variety of scenarios to transfer contractual obligations. While there are benefits to using a Deed of Novation, there are also risks that must be carefully considered. Seeking legal advice is crucial to ensure that the document is drafted correctly and executed properly. At XYZ Law Firm, we offer a free consultation to homeowners in NSW who are considering a Deed of Novation. Contact us today to schedule a meeting with one of our experienced lawyers.
